page.title: 16BUILDINGS IN EAGLE
page.content: There is an Anglican Church in Eagle. There are services there on sunday. There was also a chapel but that is now a private house. The chapel sunday school is held in the village hall. The village hall was modernised a few years ago. Now it is used for parties,discos,weddings,meetings,play_ group,bingo,jumble sales and by several other organisations. The village hall is run by a committe. There is a firm called W.B Lincoln ltd. The firm sells and repairs combines, balers, crawlers, tractors, chainsaws and lawnmowers. In the village there is a car sales and there is a petrol station. There is only one public houes and it is called the strugglers.
